text: Poul Rasmussen (21 October 1896 - 21 June 1966) was a Danish fencer. He competed in four events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Danish male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Denmark Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Copenhagen
title: Poul Rasmussen
